title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of GCM Grosvenor Inc

content.text: GCM Grosvenor Inc goes public and starts trading on the NASDAQ stock exchange under the ticker symbol GCMG.
GCM Grosvenor Inc announces a 2-for-1 stock split. This means that each existing shareholder receives an additional share for every share owned.

content.section: 2017: Acquires Financial Assets of Arden Asset Management
content.text: GCM Grosvenor Inc completes the acquisition of the financial assets of Arden Asset Management, expanding its capabilities in alternative investments.
GCM Grosvenor Inc announces another 2-for-1 stock split, increasing the number of outstanding shares.

content.section: 2020: Announcement of Merger with Nasdaq Private Market
content.text: GCM Grosvenor Inc announces a merger with Nasdaq Private Market, a leading provider of liquidity solutions for private securities. The merger is expected to enhance the company's private market capabilities.

content.section: 2021: Completion of Merger with Nasdaq Private Market
content.text: GCM Grosvenor Inc completes the merger with Nasdaq Private Market, further strengthening its position in the private securities market.

news.headline: GCM Grosvenor Reports Third Quarter 2023 Earnings Results
news.summary: CHICAGO, Nov. 08, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- GCM Grosvenor (Nasdaq: GCMG) today reported its results for the third quarter 2023, which have been posted to the Public Shareholders section of GCM Grosvenor’s website at https://www.gcmgrosvenor.com/shareholder-events. A conference call to discuss GCM Grosvenor’s financial results will be held today, Wednesday, November 8, 2023, at 9:30 a.m. ET.
